titleStmt.title: The young-womans answer to her former sweet-heart on board one of His Majesty's ships, who complains of her vnkindness. Tune of, I lov'd you dearly, &c.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
Verse: "In e'ery street I hear'em sing ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
